body:
Declare @FisDetayID int,@Miktar_Mt Decimal (18,6),@Miktar_kg Decimal(18,6),@StokAmbarID int,@SeriID int,@KaliteID int,@urunID int



					   Declare c Cursor Local For
					  SELECT  SA.StokAmbarID,SA.Miktar_Mt,SA.Miktar_Kg,SA.UrunID,SA.SeriID,SA.KaliteID From  IT06_StokAmbar SA 
						INNER JOIN  IT01_Ambarlar A On A.AmbarID = SA.AmbarID
						Where Sa.AmbarID  =207
					   Open c
					   Fetch Next From c Into @StokAmbarID , @Miktar_Mt ,@Miktar_kg ,@urunID ,@SeriID  ,@KaliteID
					   While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 Begin


					   Exec SP06_CreateFis_HT @HareketTipID = 2181, @Miktar_Mt = @Miktar_Mt, @Miktar_kg = @Miktar_kg, @Miktar_Ad = null, @StokAmbarID = @StokAmbarID,  @UrunID = @urunID, @SeriID = @SeriID,
                       @KaliteID = @KaliteID,@FisDetayID = @FisDetayID Output, @PersonelID = 15, @Tarih = '2020-12-22', @MFirmaID = 1

					   			
					   
					   	Fetch Next From c Into @StokAmbarID , @Miktar_Mt ,@Miktar_kg ,@urunID ,@SeriID  ,@KaliteID
					   End
					   Close c
					   Deallocate c
